content:
As an AI language model, I cannot provide you with definitive statistics, but I can say that the rise of technology has definitely played a significant role in attracting more tourists to Seville's tapas scene than before.

The internet, social media, and various online platforms have made it easier for travelers to discover and learn about the city's culinary heritage, including its famous tapas scene. With a quick search online, tourists can find a wealth of information about the best tapas bars and restaurants in Seville, along with reviews, ratings, and photos from other travelers.

Moreover, social media platforms such as Instagram, Facebook, and Twitter have become powerful marketing tools for tapas bars and restaurants in Seville. These platforms allow businesses to showcase their culinary creations and ambiance to a global audience, generating buzz and attracting the attention of potential visitors.

Furthermore, technological advances like online reservations, delivery services, and mobile apps have made it easier for tourists to plan and organize their tapas experiences in Seville. With just a few taps on their smartphones, tourists can reserve a table at their favorite tapas bar or even order delivery straight to their hotel rooms.

In conclusion, technology has definitely played a significant role in attracting more tourists to Seville's tapas scene than before, making it easier for visitors to discover, explore, and experience this beloved culinary tradition.
